name: actorcatalog
title: Actor Catalog
description: たつみ作の立ち絵ツール（Theatre Inserts）対応の立ち絵画像がいっぱい。D&D5版のキャラシにて表情差分設定済です。This is a module which adds a bunch of anime style character portraits created by Tatsumi. If you are using the dnd5e sheet you can also import emotes enabled sheets aswell.
author: tatsumi
